game.name: Iridescent
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, Steam 도전 과제, 컨트롤러 일부 지원, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: Zelda meets Sekiro. Difficult deflect combat with dungeons, exploration and puzzles inspired by classic Zelda set in a world full of charming characters, mystery and sheep people that can do miracles by manipulating colour!
game.shortDescriptionEn: Zelda meets Sekiro. Difficult deflect combat with dungeons, exploration and puzzles inspired by classic Zelda set in a world full of charming characters, mystery and sheep people that can do miracles by manipulating colour!
